name: Samurai Adventures
description:
Once you get to the Rocks you finished you level (game not finished)

a/d - to move side to side

f - to throw fireballs

This game is about a samurai going after his katana and earning it. The player must destroy all enemies, at the end of this level there will be a katana and once the player gets that katana, they have to agree if they want to put the Samurai's soul into to it, this gives more power to it, if not the katana is going to be weaker. They move on to the other level which has a Boss and this Boss is a Golden Dragon where the player has to kill it to get his soul, once he gets the Dragon's soul his katana will have more power. (Dragon and katana not in-game yet as this is a prototype).
